description: Tracing the rights of passage from child to adult: puberty, one of the most turbulent phases, both physically and emotionally in the human life cycle. This episode follows the development of some very brave and honest teenagers who share their feelings on the changes taking place with the camera crew. Presented by Robert Winston.
